title: Working Student Talent Acquisition (m/f/d)
content:

We started out in Hamburg back in 2014 but weâ€™re now humbled to call the world our playground, with over 200 employees spread across 25 cities (weâ€™re remote-first), 2000+ international clients and a panel reach of 7 million, globally.

 Your mission as a Working Student Talent Acquisition


We are looking for a Working Student Talent Acquisition (m/f/d) to support our HR team in finding top talent for Appinio. The Appinio team is our very core success factor and our biggest USP. By your involvement in hiring future Appinioneers, you will have a great impact on our companyâ€™s success. As a Working Student Talent Acquisition (m/f/d) you will autonomously take over different tasks in the talent acquisition field and ensure the best experience for our candidates.

What youâ€™ll be doing


Shape the further growth of the Appinio team by creating unique job ads, identifying suitable candidates, coordinating interviews, and ensuring an exemplary candidate experience
Actively search for top-notch candidates via LinkedIn and find new and creative ways to discover talent for Appinio
Participate in interviewing Working Students until you are ready to fully take responsibility for Internship and Student positions
Be a key contact person for candidates and represent our unique company culture 
Establish and handle cooperation with universities 
Take on your own projects to make our recruiting process even more efficient


You will thrive in this role if


You are enrolled as a student in the field of Business Administration, Communications, Psychology, or similar fields - ideally with a focus on HR
You have initial work experience in Recruiting and Active Sourcing
You are passionate about finding strong candidates on LinkedIn and drafting convincing outreach messages 
You enjoy participating in the entire recruitment process and ensuring the ideal candidate journey
You have strong communication skills, and a high level of empathy
You are pragmatic and have a proactive mindset
You are structured, good at setting priorities, and 100% reliable
You are fluent in English
German skills is a plus 









What's in it for you?

All the hardware you need and your own MacBook
Udemy L&D Platform - full access to 22,000+ courses and certifications to deepen your knowledge as your career progresses









This post not only outlines our ideal candidate but also serves as an inspiration for what this role can evolve into. Even if you consider yourself an 80% fit but have a genuine passion for this position, we encourage you to apply. We're eager to hear from individuals who share our enthusiasm.
Appinio is an equal opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran or disability status.
